name: Xtreme Skier 21
description:
Skiing Xtreme Style in retro pixel heaven.

Complete with:

Single player campaign. Unlock courses over the mountain which gradually get harder and more Xtreme!  Both DAY and NIGHT.  

Get into races with Crazy Eddy, the local pro for bragging rights and bonuses.

Watch out for the wild life at night...

Customize your skier and upgrade your skis.

Online multiplayer. Travel to the Alpine Ski Village, and embark on your ski adventures with other skiers online.  

Go Skiing, shopping, rent some skis, and have some snowball fun.

Avalanche mode - // endless, last as long as you can to outrun the Avalanche!

Super-G Slalom to go for that best time.

Retro Mode - throwback to the beginnings of video game skiing.

Re-sizeable window mode or Fullscreen 

PC only.
